body: Hi, i've been lurking around these parts for a while. I've been posting in some threads, playing in some matches, finding and reporting some bugs, and even coding a bit on Avicus's Github. So, I decided to make an AMA thread because WTH. So, AMA me up ppls.
body_tagged: Hi, i've been lurking around these parts for a while. I've been posting in some threads, playing in some matches, finding and reporting some bugs, and even coding a bit on Avicus's Github. So, I decided to make an AMA thread because WTH. So, AMA me up ppls.
title: Ey, it me! AMA

replies.body: I had ActionPVP's IP in my server list and one day I noticed the MOTD had changed. As for ActionPVP, I think it was in the OCN mumble.
replies.body_tagged: I had ActionPVP's IP in my server list and one day I noticed the MOTD had changed. As for ActionPVP, I think it was in the OCN mumble.

replies.body: Hello? I guess no one has any questions for me. :(
replies.body_tagged: Hello? I guess no one has any questions for me. :(

replies.body:
You said you are coding some things on the avicus github. Elaborate.
What programm languages do you know?
What is your favorite of them?
replies.body_tagged:
You said you are coding some things on the avicus github. Elaborate.
What programm languages do you know?
What is your favorite of them?

replies.body: I am working on this. It is a planned revamp of the current advices game manager. I am proficient in Ruby, Java, HTML, and know some Swift. I mainly code in Java and Ruby though. I have worked on a number of projects with plugins and websites, many of them private. I code for fun, but one day I hope to turn it into a job.
